summary: This collection of documents revolves around Hugh C. McDonald and his company, World Associates, Inc., detailing CIA's assessment, security clearances, and potential utilization of McDonald's voice identification system and his planned world tour for intelligence gathering.
summary_one_paragraph: This compilation of memoranda and cables spanning from 1954 to 1970 concerns Hugh C. McDonald and World Associates, Inc. It details CIA's interest in McDonald's voice identification system, his planned world tour to promote his products, and his potential to provide intelligence. The documents include security clearances granted to McDonald, assessments of his reliability, and discussions regarding his potential operational use by the CIA, alongside considerations of his connections with law enforcement entities and periodic updates on his activities and contacts.
title: Case 52872 - Hugh C. McDonald/World Associates, Inc.
recipient: Various CIA Field Offices and Divisions
